text: Bwira bamwe mu Barabu bo mu cyaro banze kujya ku rugamba uti “Muzahamagarirwa kujya kurwana n’abantu bafite imbaraga zihambaye; muzarwana na bo cyangwa bishyire mu maboko yanyu (babe Abayisilamu nta mirwano ibayeho). Nimuramuka mwumviye Allah, azabaha ibihembo byiza, ariko nimutera umugongo nk’uko mwabigenje mbere, (Allah) azabahanisha ibihano bibabaza
